content.title: Maize Development through Cluster Approach Scheme
content.details: The scheme 'Maize Development through Cluster Approach' was launched by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya. The objective of the scheme is to increase food grain production in order to attain self-sufficiency by growing high-yielding varieties of maize and also by adopting crop and location-specific production technology.
benefits: Under the scheme, quality seeds shall be supplied to farmers at subsidized rates for higher yield.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Meghalaya.
The applicant should be a bonafide farmer engaged in agriculture.
The applicant should have sufficient available cultivable land of (0.025 hectares).
content.application_process: The eligible bonafide farmer can apply/write an application on plain paper. Along with the application, attach copies of all the mandatory documents (self-attest, if required). Submit the duly filled and signed application along with the documents at the nearest office of the Horticulture Development Officer of a CD Block/Agriculture Circle. The bonafide farmers shall be selected on a first come first serve basis.
documents_required: Documents proof of having sufficient available cultivable land

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objectives of the scheme is to increase food grain production in order to attain self-sufficiency by growing high yielding varieties of maize and also by adopting the crop and location specific production technology.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Department of Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare, Government of Meghalaya.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers of Meghalaya who have sufficient available cultivable land (0.025 hectares) can avail the benefits under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the pattern of assistance?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, quality seeds shall be supplied to farmers at subsidized rates for higher yield thereby enhancing the farmers’ economy.

faqs.question: How to avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The bonafide farmers can apply in plain paper through the nearest Horticulture Development Officer of a CD Block/Agriculture circle.

faqs.question: What is the beneficiaries’ selection procedure?
faqs.answer: The beneficiaries will be selected on a first come first served basis.

faqs.question: Whom can I contact in case of any queries or need for clarification?
faqs.answer: Sectoral Officer, Directorate of Agriculture; District Agriculture Officer; Sub-Divisional Officer; Agriculture Development Officer.
